Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near Pershing/Wells
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses temp. rerouted EB: 39th, Wallace, Root, Princeton and 39th; Wb: 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 39th and Wells due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 39th, Wallace, Root and Princeton and 39th.

Westbound buses will operate via 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays at Sheridan Affecting Howard and 95th BOUND (Red Line) Line Service
ShortDescription: Howard and 95thbound (Red Line )trains are experiencing a delay at Sheridan: due to unathorized person on the tracks. Update to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard and 95th bound(Red Line )trains are experiencing a delay at Sheridan: due to unathorized person on the tracks. Update to follow.

Personnel are working to restore service/Assistance has been requested and we hope to resume service shortly.

Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Updates will be posted as new information becomes available.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Belmont
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to  a medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to a medical emergency.

As a result, trains are operating only between Belmont and 95th at this time.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.  Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Belmont to provide connecting service

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
